title: This Is What Life After the N.B.A. Looks Like
description: Life is good for some N.B.A. retirees who use millions in earnings to do whatever they want. But others say they have struggled to find a new identity without basketball.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola
media:credit: Jacob Biba for The New York Times
media:description: Johnny Davis played in the N.B.A. in the 1970s and 1980s. In those days, before the league became so lucrative, players often had second jobs.
